attributes.action: Prime minister Teresa May should step down and a leave supporter to take charge
attributes.background: I have no affiliation to any political parties. I vote for the party who looks best for the UK in any election campaign. I voted to leave the eu and I don't think Mrs May is getting us a good deal. I would like Mrs May to appoint a  leave supporter to take charge of the negotiations with the Eu

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister.
